Field.Description: Enable-Disable TTL decrement

Field.Description: Enable-Disable QoS and DP update (enable- use qos_variable, disable- use initial_qos_and_dp)

Field.Name: FORWARDING_EDITING_ENABLE
Field.Description: Indicates whether to edit the forwarding or not

Field.Name: PUSH_STP_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable-Disable STP stack update

Field.Description: Enable-Disable Statistics stack update

Field.Name: VSD_ENABLE

Field.Name: USE_ETPS_TOS
Field.Description: Enable-Disable for Using Etps TOS in FWD stage

Field.Name: FODO_UPDATE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable-Disable forward_domain signal update (enable- use ETPS.ToS.forward_domain (arr_output), disable- keep original value)

Field.Description: Enable-Disable MTU Trap

Field.Description: Egress Trap Stage Context ID

Field.Name: BTS_SYS_HDR_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, System headers are not removed

Field.Name: BTS_TERM_HDR_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, Terminated headers are not removed

Field.Name: GEN_RECYCLE_COPY_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, a copy of the Forward Packet is transmitted on the Recycle Interface

Field.Name: FWD_RECYCLE_CROP_PACKET_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, only the first 128B of the Forward Packet are copied to the recycle port

Field.Name: FWD_RECYCLE_APPEND_ORIGINAL_FTMH_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, Aligner appends the original FTMH to the Recycle Packet

Field.Name: DROP_FORWARD_COPY_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, the Forward Packet is dropped by the Aligner, Also passed to CRPS

Field.Name: KILL_MIRROR_COPY_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, Kill the Mirror,Snoop Copy

Field.Description: If true, External Statistics are being Enabled

Field.Description: If true, Internal Statistics are being Enabled

Field.Description: If true, Candidate Header is being Enabled

Field.Description: If true, Recycle Copy is being Enabled

Field.Name: FWD_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, Forwarding Copy is being Enabled

Field.Name: TX_1588_ENABLE
Field.Description: If true, TX 1588 Processing is being Enabled
